item.title: Cyber Resilience on the Board Agenda
item.author: john@januszczak.org (John Januszczak)
item.description: In this panel discussion, John Januszczak joins experts to reframe cyber resilience from a technical expense to a strategic enabler. John highlights how resilience serves as a proxy for management quality and is essential for ensuring revenue continuity in the digital age.
